thread.title: Lane Kiffin already enjoying Boca night life as FAU coach
thread.title_full: Lane Kiffin already enjoying Boca night life as FAU coach

author: Zac Al-Khateeb (zac.alkhateeb@sportingnews.com)
title: Lane Kiffin already enjoying Boca night life as FAU coach
text:
February 4, 2017 6:14pm EST February 4, 2017 6:11pm EST Kiffin seems to be enjoying the perks of his new position at Florida Atlantic. Lane Kiffin (AP Photo) 
Updated at 6:14 p.m. ET 
Updated at 6:14 p.m. ET 
Lane Kiffin might bring a lackadaisical approach to Florida Atlantic's recruiting efforts, but he appears to be much more enthusiastic when he's off the clock. 
The FAU coach was seen chatting with the locals at Club Boca near the Florida Atlantic campusÂ â he also posed for several pictures.
